  • phpStack

  • Package

  • Tree 
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: /**
  4:  * Basic Stack Class.
  5:  *
  6:  * Created for use with eqEOS. May eventually be replaced with native
  7:  * PHP functions `array_pop()`, `array_push()`, and `end()`
  8:  *
  9:  * @author Jon Lawrence <jlawrence11@gmail.com>
 10:  * @copyright Copyright Â©2005-2013 Jon Lawrence
 11:  * @license http://opensource.org/licenses/LGPL-2.1 LGPL 2.1 License
 12:  * @package Math
 13:  * @subpackage EOS
 14:  * @version 2.0
 15:  */
 16: class phpStack {
 17:     private $index;
 18:     private $locArray;
 19: 
 20:     /**
 21:      * Constructor
 22:      *
 23:      * Initializes the stack
 24:      */
 25:     public function __construct() {
 26:         //define the private vars
 27:         $this->locArray = array();
 28:         $this->index = -1;
 29:     }
 30: 
 31:     /**
 32:      * Peek
 33:      *
 34:      * Will view the last element of the stack without removing it
 35:      *
 36:      * @return Mixed An element of the array or false if none exist
 37:      */
 38:     public function peek() {
 39:         if($this->index > -1)
 40:             return $this->locArray[$this->index];
 41:         else
 42:             return false;
 43:     }
 44: 
 45:     /**
 46:      * Poke
 47:      *
 48:      * Will add an element to the end of the stack
 49:      *
 50:      * @param Mixed Element to add
 51:      */
 52:     public function poke($data) {
 53:         $this->locArray[++$this->index] = $data;
 54:     }
 55: 
 56:     /**
 57:      * Push
 58:      *
 59:      * Alias of {@see phpStack::poke()}
 60:      * Adds element to the stack
 61:      *
 62:      * @param Mixed Element to add
 63:      */
 64:     public function push($data) {
 65:         //allias for 'poke'
 66:         $this->poke($data);
 67:     }
 68: 
 69:     /**
 70:      * Pop
 71:      *
 72:      * Retrives an element from the end of the stack, and removes it from
 73:      * the stack at the same time. If no elements, returns boolean false
 74:      *
 75:      * @return Mixed Element at end of stack or false if none exist
 76:      */
 77:     public function pop() {
 78:         if($this->index > -1)
 79:         {
 80:             $this->index--;
 81:             return $this->locArray[$this->index+1];
 82:         }
 83:         else
 84:             return false;
 85:     }
 86: 
 87:     /**
 88:      * Clear
 89:      *
 90:      * Clears the stack to be reused.
 91:      */
 92:     public function clear() {
 93:         $this->index = -1;
 94:         $this->locArray = array();
 95:     }
 96: 
 97:     /**
 98:      * Get Stack
 99:      *
100:      * Returns the array of stack elements, keeping all, indexed at 0
101:      *
102:      * @return Mixed Array of stack elements or false if none exist.
103:      */
104:     public function getStack() {
105:         if($this->index > -1)
106:         {
107:             return array_values($this->locArray);
108:         }
109:         else
110:             return false;
111:     }
112: }
113: 
114: ?>
Classes API documentation generated by ApiGen 2.8.0
